metadata.title: CVE-2018-4089 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in certain Apple products. iOS before 11.2.5 isaffected. macOS before 10.13.3 is affected. Safari before 11.0.3 isaffected. tvOS before 11.2.5 is affected. The issue involves the "WebKit"component. It allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause adenial of service (memory corruption and application crash) via a craftedweb site.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-4089` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.0 - 2.18.4-1
gir1.2-webkit2-4.0 - 2.18.4-1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-18 - 2.18.4-1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-bin - 2.18.4-1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37 - 2.18.4-1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37-gtk2 - 2.18.4-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: webkitgtk package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
webkit2gtk package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.18.4-1').
qtwebkit-source package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
